titles.title: Vaccine Injury Compensation Program Improvement Act of 2000
To amend the Public Health Service Act to revise certain standards that are required for petitions under the National Vaccine Injury Compensation Program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment.

bill.summary: 10/26/2000--Introduced. Vaccine Injury Compensation Program Improvement Act of 2000 - Amends provisions of the Public Health Service Act relating to the national vaccine injury compensation program to require a petition for compensation under the program to contain an affidavit that the petitioner sustained or aggravated an illness, disability, injury, or condition in positive association with a vaccine received.
